casebody.data:
Second Department,

November, 1948.

(November 8, 1948.) Morris Aks, Appellant, v. Buffalo Savings Bank, Respondent.

Motion for reargument denied, without costs. Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. The following questions are certified: (1) Was the order of Special Term, dated July 15, 1948, properly made? (2) Was the order of Special Term, dated August 13, 1948, properly made? Present — Nolan, P. J., Carswell, Johnston, Adel and Sneed, JJ. [See ante, p. 893.]
